actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Innovation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Protection

official_title: To require a report on cybersecurity roles and responsibilities of the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.
short_title: Homeland Security Cyber Incident Response Roles and Responsibilities Act of 2022

summary.text:
Homeland Security Cyber Incident Response Roles and Responsibilities Act of 2022

This bill requires the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) to report on its roles and responsibilities, as well as those of its components, for responding to cyber incidents. DHS must coordinate with the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency on the report.

titles.title: Homeland Security Cyber Incident Response Roles and Responsibilities Act of 2022
